question: At the jewelry store, Maddy saw necklaces displayed on hooks. Skip count backward by 2s from 10 and fill in the missing blanks.
In the furniture store, they counted chairs arranged in rows. Skip count backward by 2s from 16 and fill in the missing blanks.
At the pet shop, they saw fishbowls lined up on shelves. Skip count backward by 2s from 27 and fill in the missing blanks.
In the art store, there are boxes of crayons. Skip count backward by 2s from 74 to fill in the missing numbers.
In the electronics store, there are chargers displayed in pairs. Skip count backward by 2s from 116 to fill in the missing numbers.
